sentences.en: Avoid changing a nappy unless it's dirty or very wet.
sentences.cn: 除非尿布脏了或非常湿，否则别换。

sentences.en: Braking in the wet in heavy traffic is never fun.
sentences.cn: 在交通拥堵的雨天里踩刹车绝不是什么好玩的事。

sentences.en: Fielding nervously wet his lips and tried to smile.
sentences.cn: 菲尔丁紧张地舔了舔嘴唇，努力挤出笑容。

sentences.en: He stripped off his wet clothes and stepped into the shower.
sentences.cn: 他脱掉湿衣服走进浴室。

sentences.en: He turned away to wring out the wet shirt.
sentences.cn: 他走开去把湿衬衫拧干。

sentences.en: Here and there a drift across the road was wet and slushy.
sentences.cn: 路上不时会有吹聚起的积雪，泥泞而湿滑。

sentences.en: I lay the painting flat to stop the wet paint running.
sentences.cn: 我把油画平放以防止未干的颜料流动。

sentences.en: I lowered myself to the water's edge, getting my feet wet.
sentences.cn: 我弯下身子走到水边，把脚弄湿了。

sentences.en: I managed to pull myself up onto a wet, sloping ledge.
sentences.cn: 我终于爬上了一块潮湿倾斜的暗礁。

sentences.en: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.cn: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.en: It's enough to make you wet yourself, if you'll pardon the expression.
sentences.cn: 这足以吓得你尿裤子了，请原谅我这么说。

sentences.en: James came out of his bedroom, toweling his wet hair.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯从卧室出来，用毛巾擦着他湿漉漉的头发。

sentences.en: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
Their noises were magnified in the still, wet air.
sentences.cn: 他们的喧闹声在凝滞而潮湿的空气中显得更吵了。

sentences.en: There’s more wet weather on the way.
sentences.cn: 未来还有更多湿雨天气。

sentences.en: They had come in from the cold and the wet.
sentences.cn: 他们从寒冷且下着雨的外面进来。

sentences.en: This wet area also attracts frogs, toads and newts.
sentences.cn: 这片潮湿地区也吸引了青蛙、蟾蜍和蝾螈一类的生物。

sentences.en: When assembling the pie, wet the edges where the two crusts join.
sentences.cn: 捏合馅饼时，要弄湿两张饼皮粘连的地方。

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 湿润剂；（印刷前纸张的）湿润工

phrases.tran_cn: 乳臭末干的；没见过世面的
扫兴的人；湿毯子；扫兴的事
(英，非正式)以喝酒来庆祝婴儿的出生

trans.tran_en: covered in or full of water or another liquid

trans.tran_cn: 雨，液体，保守党温和派成员
